title: Dragon Age: The Veilguard Finally Has a Release Date - Kinda Funny Games Daily 08.15.24
description:
Go to KindaFunny.com/MonsterHunterNow to play right now!

Dragon Age has a release date, The Plucky Squire has a release date, and rumors of an Xbox game being ported to PlayStation.

Today after, KFGD, you’ll get:
 - GAMESCAST - 2XKO interview
 - Followed by Screencast which is an Alien Romulus Review
 - The STREAM is Spectre Divide
If you’re a Kinda Funny Member:
 - You can get today’s Gregway being done by Barrett
 - And you can get Kinda Funny Podcast this afternoon, and tomorrow on YouTube and Podcast services.
